content:
isaacvetter opened PR #300 from STU1-publish-grammar-fixes to master:

• In first paragraph of Session Discovery section there is a repeated ‘the’
but also the the hub.url which contains the base url of the Hub.
• In the second paragraph of the Event Notification section there is an ‘a’ instead of an ‘an’
If the Hub does not receive a successful HTTP status from a event notification
• In the first paragraph of the Events section there is an ‘an’ instead of an ‘a’
FHIRcast describes an workflow event subscription and notification scheme
